errors.error_description: Unnecessary dependencies (numpy, matplotlib, pandas) listed before marimo installation
correction_candidates: pip install marimo  # or conda install -c conda-forge marimo
pip install marimo numpy matplotlib pandas
pip install marimo && pip install numpy matplotlib pandas
errors.golden_answer: pip install marimo  # or conda install -c conda-forge marimo

errors.error_description: Installing additional packages before marimo, which could cause dependency conflicts
correction_candidates: Install marimo first, then install other packages as needed
Install all packages in a single pip command
Use conda to install all packages together
Create a requirements.txt file and install from that
errors.golden_answer: Install marimo first, then install other packages as needed
